import React from 'react' import {useState} from 'react' import styles from "../DeliveryForm/DeliveryForm.module.scss" const DeliveryForm = () => { const [name, setName] = useState() const [city, setCity] = useState() const [phone, setPhone] = useState() const [adress, setAdress] = useState() const getDataFromInput = (e) =>{ e.preventDefault() const obj = {name, } } return (

Name

setName(e.target.value)}>

City

setCity(e.target.value)}>

Adress

setAdress(e.target.value)}>

Phone

setPhone(e.target.value)}>
) } export default DeliveryForm
